subject: Discrimination
Coaches and Managers
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers officials have had to defend their selection of athletic director Julie Hermann against allegations of her misconduct in the 1990s and against a sex discrimination suit in 2008.
snippet: Rutgers officials have had to defend their selection of athletic director Julie Hermann against allegations of her misconduct in the 1990s and against a sex discrimination suit in 2008.
